happy.text: The smile on your face looks good on you. Keep it.
You're glowing today. Did you notice?
Whatever you're doing, it's working. Stay golden.
Happiness suits you. Wear it often.

sad.text: It's gonna be okay. Eat something sweet â€” it might lift your mood a little.
Go for a walk and listen to Ophelia. It'll help, I promise.
Wrap yourself in a blanket. Make some tea. You deserve softness right now.
This feeling is temporary. You've survived hard days before.
Text someone you love. Even just a hi. Connection helps.
Cry if you need to. Then drink some water. Small steps.

angry.text: This will pass. Take a break and cool down.
Step outside for five minutes. Fresh air does wonders.
Don't worry about it too much. Some things aren't worth your energy.
Splash cold water on your face. Reset.
It's okay to be frustrated. But don't let it stay too long.

bored.text: Maybe watch Good Will Hunting. But carry tissues.
Make yourself a coffee and just sit with it for a while.
Call someone you haven't talked to in a while. Surprise them.
Reorganize your desk or closet. Oddly satisfying.
Learn one random fact today. Be a tiny bit smarter by tonight.
Bake something. Even if it's just toast with too much butter.
